title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.1 - Rights of parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.1 - Rights of parties

State Regulations

Parties to removal proceedings before the Banking Board shall
at all stages thereof have all fundamental rights, including the rights of
counsel, cross-examination, presentation of evidence, objection and
motion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
